justification: "Inhibitory control will be measured using the Toolbox Flanker Task, a variation of the Eriksen Flanker task."
"Visuospatial processing will be measured using the Little Man Test (LMT; Acker, 1987)."
"Decision making will be measured using the Game of Dice Task (GDT; Brand et al., 2005)."
"Pubertal status will be assessed via the Pubertal Development Scale (PDS; Crockett & Petersen, 1987)."
"Testosterone, DHEA, and estradiol (girls only) were collected via salivary measures at baseline... and assayed in duplicate."
